Relationships - Match 3



Relationships

  • Playdots Inc.

  • 2021


Communication was a key part of my role as I had to write briefs to vendors and my team to produce art assets for marketing. Art assets needed to be checked for quality and corrections were made via feedback from stakeholders. Production of app store assets was also one of my tasks which included close collaboration with my team to ensure cohesiveness of assets.


Team

  • Marketing Design Lead: Emily Lim

  • Marketing Designer: Yunjia Yang
